name: market for heat storage, 2000l | heat storage, 2000l | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/877/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'heat storage, 2000l', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the product of a heat storage, a chrome steel tank used with heat exchanger and boiler. It has a volumetric capacity of 2,000 liters. Its production represents all materials necessary to construct it, energy consumption during manufacturing and decommission. The lifetime of the whole solar collector system is assumed at 25 years.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
